Reviews.Title: the phone was unusable and was not new
Reviews.Author: M. ormond "pinecroft004"
Reviews.Content: I received my supposedly new motorola 375 and apparently there was not a match between the phone and the charger.  In addition, I was unable to activate it with my carrier due to there being no acceptable number on the phone under the battery.  I give it a one star for prompt delivery, but even that did me no good.

ProductInfo.Features:
With True Enhanced Performance.
Latest Technical Development.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola W375 Black Triband GSM World Phone (unlocked)
